verses.verse: He<WG2036> said to<WG4314> the disciples,<WG3101> "It is<WG2076> impossible<WG418> that<WG3361> no occasions of stumbling<WG4625> should come,<WG2064> but<WG1161> woe<WG3759> to him through<WG1223> whom<WG3739> they come!<WG2064>

It would be better<WG3081> for him<WG846> if<WG1487> a<WG3684> millstone<WG3458> were hung<WG4029> around<WG4012> his<WG846> neck,<WG5137> and<WG2532> he were thrown<WG4496> into<WG1519> the sea,<WG2281> rather than<WG2228> that<WG2443> he should cause one<WG1520> of these<WG5130> little ones<WG3398> to stumble.<WG4624>

Be<WG1161> careful.<WG4337> If<WG1437> your<WG4675> brother<WG80> sins<WG264> against<WG1519> you,<WG4571> rebuke<WG2008> him.<WG846> <WG2532> If<WG1437> he repents,<WG3340> forgive<WG863> him.<WG846>

If<WG1437> he sins<WG264> against<WG1519> you<WG4571> seven times<WG2034> in the day,<WG2250> and<WG2532> seven times<WG2034> returns,<WG2250> <WG1994> <WG4571> saying,<WG3004> <WG3340> 'I repent,' you<WG4571> shall forgive<WG863> him.<WG846>"
The<WG2532> apostles<WG652> said<WG2036> to the Lord,<WG2962> "Increase<WG4369> our<WG2254> faith.<WG4102>"

The<WG1161> Lord<WG2962> said,<WG2036> "If<WG1487> you had<WG2192> faith<WG4102> like<WG5613> a grain<WG2848> of mustard seed,<WG4615> you would tell<WG3004><WG99999> this<WG3778> sycamore tree,<WG4807> <WG1610> 'Be uprooted, and<WG2532> be planted<WG5452> in<WG1722> the sea,<WG2281>' and<WG2532> it would obey<WG5219><WG99999> you.<WG5213>

But<WG1161> who<WG5101> is there among<WG1537> you,<WG5216> having<WG2192> a<WG2112> servant<WG1401> plowing<WG722> or<WG2228> keeping sheep,<WG4165> that will say,<WG2046> <WG2112> <WG3739> when he comes<WG1525> in from<WG1537> the field,<WG68> <WG3928> 'Come immediately and sit down at the table,<WG377>'

and<WG235> will<WG2046> not rather<WG3780> tell<WG2046> him,<WG846> <WG2090> 'Prepare <WG5101> my supper,<WG1172> clothe<WG2532> yourself<WG4024> properly,<WG2532> and serve<WG1247> me,<WG3427> while<WG2193> I eat<WG5315> and<WG2532> drink.<WG4095> Afterward<WG3326><WG99999> you<WG4771> shall eat<WG5315> and<WG2532> drink<WG4095>'?
Does he<WG2192> <WG3361> thank<WG5485> that<WG1565> servant<WG1401> because<WG3754> he did<WG4160> the things that<WG3588> were commanded?<WG1299> <WG846> I think<WG1380> not.<WG3756>

Even<WG2532> so<WG3779> you<WG5210> also,<WG3752> when you have done<WG4160> all<WG3956> the things that<WG3588> are commanded<WG1299> you,<WG5213> say,<WG3004> <WG2070> 'We are unworthy<WG888> servants.<WG3754> We have done<WG4160> <WG3739> <WG3754> our<WG4160> duty.<WG3784>'"

It<WG2532> happened<WG1096> as<WG1722> he<WG846> was on his way<WG4198> to<WG1519> Jerusalem,<WG2419> that<WG2532> he<WG846> was passing<WG1330> along<WG1223> the borders<WG3319> of Samaria<WG4540> and<WG2532> Galilee.<WG1056>

As<WG2532> he<WG846> entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> a certain<WG5100> village,<WG2968> ten<WG1176> men<WG435> who were lepers<WG3015> met<WG528> him,<WG846> who<WG3739> stood<WG2476> at a distance.<WG4207>
They<WG846> lifted up<WG142> their voices,<WG5456> saying,<WG3004> "Jesus,<WG2424> Master,<WG1988> have mercy<WG1653> on us!<WG2248>"

When<WG2532> he saw<WG1492> them,<WG2036> he said to them,<WG846> "Go<WG4198> and show<WG1925> yourselves<WG1438> to the priests.<WG2409>" It<WG2532> happened that<WG1096> as<WG1722> they went,<WG5217> they<WG846> were cleansed.<WG2511>
One<WG1520> of<WG1537> them,<WG846> when he saw<WG1492> that<WG3754> he was healed,<WG2390> turned back,<WG5290> glorifying<WG1392> God<WG2316> with<WG3326> a loud<WG3173> voice.<WG5456>
He<WG2532> fell<WG4098> on<WG1909> his face<WG4383> at<WG3844> Jesus<WG846>' feet,<WG4228> giving<WG2168> him<WG846> thanks;<WG2168> and<WG2532> he<WG846> was<WG2258> a Samaritan.<WG4541>
<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> answered,<WG611> <WG2036> "Weren't<WG3780> the<WG2511> ten<WG1176> cleansed?<WG2511> But<WG1161> where<WG4226> are the nine?<WG1767>
Were<WG2147> there none<WG3756> found<WG2147> who returned<WG5290> to give<WG1325> glory<WG1391> to God,<WG2316> except<WG1487> <WG3361> this<WG3778> stranger?<WG241>"
Then<WG2532> he said<WG2036> to him,<WG846> "Get up,<WG450> and go your way.<WG4198> Your<WG4675> faith<WG4102> has<WG4982> healed<WG4982> you.<WG4571>"

Being<WG1161> asked<WG1905> by<WG5259> the Pharisees<WG5330> when<WG4219> the Kingdom<WG932> of God<WG2316> would come,<WG2064> he answered<WG611> them,<WG846> <WG2532> "The Kingdom<WG932> of God<WG2316> doesn't<WG3756> come<WG2064> with<WG3326> observation;<WG3907>

neither<WG3761> will they say,<WG2046> <WG2400> 'Look, here!<WG5602>' or,<WG2228> <WG2400> 'Look, there!<WG1563>' for<WG1063> behold,<WG2400> the Kingdom<WG932> of God<WG2316> is<WG2076> within<WG1787> you.<WG5216>"

He<WG1161> said<WG2036> to<WG4314> the disciples,<WG3101> "The days<WG2250> will come,<WG2064> when<WG3753> you will desire<WG1937> to see<WG1492> one<WG1520> of the days<WG2250> of the Son<WG5207> of Man,<WG444> and<WG2532> you will<WG3700> not<WG3756> see it.<WG3700>
They<WG2532> will tell<WG2046> you,<WG5213> <WG2400> 'Look, here!<WG5602>' or<WG2228><WG99999> 'Look, there!<WG1563>' Don't<WG3361> go<WG565> away,<WG3366> nor follow<WG1377> after them,<WG565>

for<WG1063> as<WG5618> the lightning,<WG796> when it flashes<WG797> out of<WG1537> the one<WG3588> part under<WG5259> the sky,<WG3772> shines<WG2989> to<WG1519> the other<WG3588> part under<WG5259> the sky;<WG3772> so<WG3779> will<WG2071> the<WG2532> Son<WG5207> of Man<WG444> be<WG2071> in<WG1722> his<WG846> day.<WG2250>
But<WG1161> first,<WG4412> he<WG846> must<WG1163> suffer<WG3958> many things<WG4183> and<WG2532> be rejected<WG593> by<WG575> this<WG3778> generation.<WG1074>
<WG2532> As<WG2531> it happened<WG1096> in<WG1722> the days<WG2250> of Noah,<WG3575> even so<WG3779> will it be<WG2071> also<WG2532> in<WG1722> the days<WG2250> of the Son<WG5207> of Man.<WG444>

They ate,<WG2068> they drank,<WG4095> they married,<WG1060> they were given in marriage,<WG1547> until<WG891> the day<WG2250> that<WG3739> Noah<WG3575> entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> the ship,<WG2787> and<WG2532> the flood<WG2627> came,<WG2064> and<WG2532> destroyed<WG622> them all.<WG537>

Likewise,<WG3668> even<WG2532> as<WG5613> it happened<WG1096> in<WG1722> the days<WG2250> of Lot:<WG3091> they ate,<WG2068> they drank,<WG4095> they bought,<WG59> they sold,<WG4453> they planted,<WG5452> they built;<WG3618>

but<WG1161> in the day<WG2250> that<WG3739> Lot<WG3091> went<WG1831> out<WG575> from Sodom,<WG4670> it rained<WG1026> fire<WG4442> and<WG2532> sulfur<WG2303> from<WG575> the sky,<WG3772> and<WG2532> destroyed<WG622> them all.<WG537>
It will be<WG2071> the same<WG2596> way<WG5024> in<WG3739> the day<WG2250> that<WG601> the Son<WG5207> of Man<WG444> is revealed.<WG5023>

In<WG1722> that<WG1565> day,<WG2250> he who<WG3739> will be<WG2071> on<WG1909> the housetop,<WG1430> and<WG2532> his<WG846> goods<WG4632> in<WG1722> the house,<WG3614> let him<WG2597> not<WG3361> go down<WG2597> to take<WG142> them<WG846> away.<WG142> Let<WG2532> him<WG1994> who is<WG3588> in<WG1722> the field<WG68> likewise<WG3668> not<WG3361> turn<WG1994> <WG1519> back.<WG1994>
Remember<WG3421> Lot<WG3091>'s wife!<WG1135>
<WG3739> Whoever<WG1437> seeks<WG2212> to save<WG4982> his<WG846> life<WG5590> loses<WG622> it,<WG846> but<WG2532> whoever<WG1437> <WG3739> loses<WG622> his life<WG846> preserves<WG2225> it.<WG846>

I tell<WG3004> you,<WG5213> in that<WG3778> night<WG3571> there will be<WG2071> two<WG1417> people in<WG1909> one<WG1520> bed.<WG2825> The one<WG1520> will be taken,<WG3880> and<WG2532> the other<WG2087> will be left.<WG863>
There will be<WG2071> two<WG1417> grinding<WG229> grain<WG1909> together.<WG846> One<WG1520> will be taken,<WG3880> and<WG2532> the other<WG2087> will be left.<WG863>"

They,<WG2532> answering,<WG611> asked<WG3004> him,<WG846> "Where,<WG4226> Lord?<WG2962>" He<WG2962> said<WG2036> to them,<WG846> "Where<WG3699> the body<WG4983> is,<WG1563> there will<WG4863> the vultures also be gathered together.<WG4863>"
